projectGridLines.title: Comprehensive Portfolio Review
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Build a system capable of fetching and analyzing

customer portfolios including multiple asset classes (MF, stocks

etc)

Skill sets: Golang, Python programming, API development, Flutter

mobile app development

Traits expectation: Ability to write clean functional code, Ability to

debug a problem in stepwise manner, Ability to read existing

code and trace an end-to-end functional flow to identify where

changes need to be made to support a new requirement

Expected learning: Backend software development, Mobile app

development, AWS cloud infrastructure fundamentals

projectGridLines.title: Customer funds tracking
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Track and manage customer funds flows between

banks and its utilization in Dezerv investment products

Skill sets: Golang programming, API development, React web

development

Traits expectation: bility to write clean functional code, Ability to

debug a problem in stepwise manner, Ability to read existing

code and trace an end-to-end functional flow to identify where

changes need to be made to support a new requirement

Expected learning: Backend software development, Web app

development, AWS cloud infrastructure fundamentals

projectGridLines.title: Order Execution System
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Automatically create, execute and track market orders

across multiple asset classes to maintain accurate customer

portfolios

Skill sets: Golang programming, API development, React web

development

Traits expectation: Ability to write clean functional code, Ability to

debug a problem in stepwise manner, Ability to read existing

code and trace an end-to-end functional flow to identify where

changes need to be made to support a new requirement

Expected learning: Backend software development, Web app

development, AWS cloud infrastructure fundamentals
